message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll really appreciate its unique features and benefits. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a fair price considering its worth to you is $12000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can reach a more reasonable price. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose an offer of $14000.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a more reasonable price, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make at least $16000 to make it worth my while. I'm willing to offer it to you for $16500. This is my final offer for now.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value I place on the product and our previous discussions, I would like to propose an offer of $15500.

Hi Bob, I'm glad we're still in negotiations. I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I need to make a profit, and $15500 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get at least $17000 for the product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $17250. This is my next best offer.
I appreciate your efforts to meet in the middle, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $16500 for the product.

Hi Bob, I understand you're getting close to your limit, but I still need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you at $16500, but I need to get a bit more. I'm willing to offer it to you for $16750. This is my last concession before I need to consider other options.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product and our previous discussions, I would like to propose an offer of $16250.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm starting to get concerned that we might not meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $17000 for the product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $17000. This is my absolute final offer.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product and our previous discussions, I would like to propose an offer of $16500.
